we code websites for her.

Personalised services to bring you the greatest growth.

Our services are life changing

For women in business and entrepreneurs

No matter the size of the dream or the size of the business, we developed King Code to help brands increase their online presence and strengthen brand awareness. We offer a wide range of creative online services to convert your clicks into sales.

Website development, website design, social media management, social media course, content creation and influencer marketing.

That's for me!

Web Development

Using various coding languages like HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery, we create beautiful custom-coded websites that are fast to load and built using Jekyll. Our websites come with a client management system (CMS) that allows you to edit your website without having to understand coding at all!

→

Web Design

Google research states that 72% of people will use only their mobile to access the internet by 2025, therefore, your website must be visually pleasing and easy-to-navigate on multiple devices and browsers. We create websites that engage your target audience regardless of the device type.

→

Content Creation

You'll always need fresh content! King Code is a creative agency with professional photographers who produce high-quality images for luxury hotels, restaurants and small businesses. We capture lifestyle, travel, food and venue photography that you can use for social media, websites or booking.com!

→

Social Media Management

You know that going online is important, but you don't have time to do so. We'll take care of all things creative and all things online. We'll personally manage your social media accounts so that you can focus on what you're good at: the business side of business.

→
